content: this legal text summarizes a court case in ljubljana slovenia the case involves a plaintiff and a defendant and the judgment was made on november 23 2017 the plaintiff incurred costs of 255192 eur which the defendant is responsible for paying the case lasted for 1 year and 3 months from august 24 2016 to november 23 2017 the final resolution of the case involves the division of a real estate property worth 2718420 eur between the two expartners the plaintiff and defendant are entitled to half of the property each the specific sections of the marriage family relations act used in the decision are sections 51 and 59 the court ruled that the coowned property is an apartment and the shares are divided equally between the plaintiff and the defendant the defendant is ordered to register the plaintiffs right to coownership within 15 days the plaintiffs alternative claim is dismissed the defendant is also ordered to pay the plaintiff a specific amount of money with interest the plaintiff withdrew a claim for a certain amount of money and the proceedings regarding that claim are stayed the plaintiff argued that the jointly owned apartment should be considered joint property due to their contributions and the circumstances surrounding their cohabitation the court agreed and determined that the apartment is coowned property however the court rejected the plaintiffs request to have the defendant registered as the sole owner the court discussed the costs of the case and ruled that each party should bear their own costs the text also explains the process of appealing a judgment including the time limit requirements and consequences for noncompliance the text is dated november 23 2017 in ljubljana
